name: GHOSTWINTER
description:
You are in The Ghost suite. Welcome to The Virtual world - little village in Siberia, Russia. Try to complete Single game hardcore mission - it's not so easy, but the atmosphere... Winter landscape is beautiful and magic! Play Multiplayer DM/TDM/GG Matches and ranking UP! Have fun!

The game run only if you are online in Steam!

GHOSTWINTER IS:
  • Realistic graphics, cut scenes, atmospheric sound design
  • Single game hardcore mission (shooter, elements of stealth, search, horror)
  • Multiplayer (works online in test-mode - low traffic!) with real players and bots online/offline
    in three modes - Deathmatch/Team Deathmatch/Gun Game
  • Loadout - person/weapon modification (12 models of weapons in the game)
  • Ranks system, personal statistics, friends and other systems.
